channel.title: Second Best Thing to Come Out of Black Mesa
channel.description: If you are a hopless romantic like myself, check out the 1936 film The Petrified Forest. The story takes place at a gas station in Black Mesa. However, this Black Mesa is in Arizona. Still, it's quite a trip to see people in a black & white movie saying it repeatedly. Worth a watch if you're into this sort of thing.

item.title: Second Best Thing to Come Out of Black Mesa
item.dc:creator: Idi
item.description:
also real petrified forests are pretty cool and worth checking out

Read full topic
item.source: Second Best Thing to Come Out of Black Mesa
